digitalDescription.fieldData: Buy ONE(1) of BATCH & BOTTLE (Valid on 375ml).

couponDisclaimer.fieldData:
"MANUFACTURERS COUPON  START DATE 11/1/22  EXPIRATION DATE 11/22/22  OFFER VALID ONLY IN THE STATE OF IL

TO THE CONSUMER: This coupon is good for a $2.00 savings on the purchase of any ONE (1) 375mL of Batch & Bottle. Offer is limited to one coupon per purchase. You must be 21 years of age or older to redeem this coupon.
 
TO THE RETAILER: Our clearinghouse will reimburse you for the face value of this coupon plus $.08 handling provided that you and the consumer have complied with the terms of this offer. Coupon may not be assigned or transferred; invoices proving purchase of sufficient stock to cover presented coupons must be shown on request. Coupon valid with the purchase of any ONE (1) 375mL of Batch & Bottle. Any other application may constitute fraud. Coupon void where prohibited, taxed or restricted. Consumer must pay sales tax. Cash value 1/100 cent. Consumer must be 21 years of age or older. No Doubling. Reproductions of this coupon is expressly prohibited. All coupons must be received by 3/31/23. After 3/31/23 redemption requests will not be responded to.

TO REDEEM, MAIL TO: Batch & Bottle $2.00 IRC Offer #400713  31103 Rancho Viejo Rd., Suite D-2111, San Juan Capistrano, CA 92675

Please Drink Responsibly.

2022 William Grant & Sons, Inc. New York, NY."

details.name: BATCH & BOTTLE
